outDir.description: Path to the output directory for the created design tokens

themes.description: An object with one or more themes. Each property defines a theme, and the property name is used as the theme name.

additionalProperties.description: An object defining a theme. The property name holding the object becomes the theme name.

colors.description: Defines the colors for this theme

main.description: An object with one or more color definitions. The property name is used as the color name.

additionalProperties.description: A hex color, which is used for creating a color scale. Invalid color names: neutral, success, warning, danger, info

support.description: An object with one or more color definitions. The property name is used as the color name.

additionalProperties.description: A hex color, which is used for creating a color scale. Invalid color names: neutral, success, warning, danger, info

neutral.description: A hex color, which is used for creating a color scale.

typography.description: Defines the typography for a given theme

fontFamily.description: Sets the font-family for this theme

borderRadius.description: Defines the border-radius for this theme

overrides.description: Overrides for generated design tokens. Currently only supports colors defined in your theme

colors.description: An object with color names as keys

additionalProperties.description: The name of the color to add overrides for, e.g. "accent"
Override values for semantic color tokens like "background-subtle", "border-default", etc.

light.description: A hex color that overrides light mode

dark.description: A hex color that overrides dark mode

severity.description: An object with severity color names as keys

additionalProperties.description: A hex color, which is used for creating a color scale

light.description: A hex color that overrides light mode

dark.description: A hex color that overrides dark mode

clean.description: Delete the output directory before building or creating tokens
